synopsis.text: Hitman Reborn's Tsuna yearns for a typical school excursion with Kyoko, but with Reborn orchestrating the trip, the ordinary becomes extraordinary! Embarking on a two-day escapade across Japan, Tsuna and his friends find themselves scaling castles and soaring on buses in true Vongola fashion. Originally an internet-exclusive special episode on the Shounen-Jump website, this thrilling adventure was later released on DVD in July 2010, complete with bonus scenes. Prepare for a wild ride as the main characters explore Japan's iconic tourist spots in this unique Katekyo Hitman Reborn! special.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
